snippet: STEERS--Charles R.C.,Jr., 89, of Rye, NY died on June 22, 2016. Beloved husband of Peggy, devoted father of Charles R.C. III, Robert H. (Lauren) and William M. (Nancy). Proud grandfather of thirteen and great-grandfather of five. A memorial service will be held at the Church of the Resurrection, Rye, NY at 11:00am on Saturday, June 25, 2016. In lieu of flowers donations may be made to Canterbury School Endowment, New Milford, CT 06775. 1/3
